entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RSA.VerifyData terminates with "Out of memory." on Linux when passing an all-zero modulus #78293
  • simd-intrinsics.c:2149, condition `size' not met #78290
  • Importing `pal.h` causes undeclared identifier because of order of macro definitions #78286
  • Cross architecture CLRDEBUGINFO<host_os><host_arch> resource missing on windows coreclr #78282
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Mono-flavored runtime never uses system libunwind #78284
  • ARM64: Missing combine eor+lsr and duplicate constant reloads #78263
  • EventSource::SendManifest causes lost events which result in unmergable ETL files #77014
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [meta] do the bug fix #78294
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reserve memory for FOH in-range #78292
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix some asserts caused by #78182. #78291
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove unused method on CngKey #78289
    area-System.Security
  • Put GenericTypeDefinition into genericCache to try to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • fix MulticastLoopback option for IPv6 #78285
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #78283
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Fix `--singlemethodname` #78207
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • `ComputeManagedAssembliesToCompileToNative`: Make `microsoft.netcore.app` check case-insensitive. #78022
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nullable annotations in ITypeDescriptorContext #78287
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #78213
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add .NET 7 perf post to deep-dive blog list #78281
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SIMDify ToLowerInvariant/ToUpperInvariant #78262
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Removing obsolete references to 'emitMaxTmpSize' #78199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
